participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys deep conversations and has a creative side.
participant_1.background: I played football for a division A college. I enjoy poetry. I try various coffees as a hobby. I'm a huge Star Wars fan. I spent a decade working in the human services field. I am a stay-at-home dad. Horror movies are my favorites. I have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to explore and create stories.
participant_2.background: I like to play with my dolls. My best friend lives next door. I don't pick up my toys. I'm four.
